response: "I don't know what's wrong with me, I feel like I'm never good enough."
"Why do I feel like I have to be perfect all the time? It's exhausting."
"I'm so sick of comparing myself to everyone else. It's like I can never measure up."
"Sometimes I just want to scream and let it all out, but I'm afraid of being judged."
"Why can't I just be happy with who I am and stop trying to meet everyone else's expectations?"
"I feel like I'm drowning in a sea of perfectionism and I don't know how to swim."
"It's like I'm constantly on a hamster wheel, always running but never getting anywhere."
"I wish I could just take a break from everything and focus on what makes me happy."
"I'm starting to realize that nobody's perfect, but it's still hard to shake off the pressure."
"I don't want to live my whole life trying to be someone I'm not. I just want to be me."
